attributes.action: gambling sites must inform customer of credit card cash advance fees
attributes.additional_details: How many people have at one time purchased a lottery ticket only to find out later they've been charged a cash advance fee? Sign this petition to make it a legal obligation for gambling sites to ask us if we accept the cash advance charge, or decline it. Businesses should be subject to the same obligations as a cash machine. This is because this is a new thing and people aren't being told at the point of sale, it should be a legal obligation.
